data.text: @AFP No masks , meanwhile our kids still forced to wear them.
@AFP I guess she likes the king of the clown circus in Ottawa. Birds of a feather flock together. Get rid of the useless monarchy. It does absolutely nothing for 🇨🇦

@kleemar1234 @AFP We can forgive but never forget. Me and my family were treated like we are plague rats. I still can't flight anywhere in Canada.  From something like that not easy to move on you know.
@AFP Where is your mask Trudope, is there a different science in UK?
@FacistUK2021 @AFP Do you actually know what that word means? Please explain how these two are Nazis.
@piotr_tur22 @AFP Really have we invaded any countries lately? You’re on Twitter right now!
@PrettyS70040131 @AFP We’re suffering…really? The Ukrainians are suffering I think we have it pretty good here.
@Dickens638 @gimmingham @AFP Mask mandates are set by the province. We don't have to wear them in SK...but most of us still do.
@PrettyS70040131 @AFP In case you haven't heard....there's a war going on...
